description: Double Issue 196/197
name: Benemerenze di Satana

description: Finally! Destro and Cobra Commander hammer things out, as Destro decides what to do concerning his son Alexander's abuse of the Cobra throne. The question is, will Cobra Commander listen to what the arms dealer has to say, or will he unleash the full wrath of Cobra upon him? Meanwhile, Storm Shadow continues his infiltration of the Joe HQ, while Beach Head gives the troops the most grueling training sessions of their lives.
name: Reckonings, Part 3 of 4

volume.name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero

description: This is it! The issue you've been waiting for. The world's two baddest ninjas go head to head in an Arashikage battle royal! Snake-Eyes. Storm Shadow. That's all you need to know.
name: Reckonings, Part 4 of 4

volume.name: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero

description:
Mr. Silke's attempt to take over the Kingpin's territory backfires when Vanessa, the Kingpin's estranged wife, exacts revenge on all his fellow conspirators, brutally killing everyone including her own son.

Afraid for his life, Silke turns himself into the FBI. When they refuse his request for protection he gives them the one piece of information that the Kingpin had that he thinks will save him.

That Daredevil is really a blind lawyer named Matt Murdock.

The FBI decide not to follow up on the Daredevil information. But the next day, on the cover of the biggest tabloid in the city, the headline reads: Daredevil's Secret Identity Revealed.

The secret is out.

Matt's partner, Foggy Nelson, holds off the swarm of media that have camped outside of Matt's brownstone waiting for confirmation. In an intense heart to heart, Foggy tells Matt to hang up his costume forever. Foggy believes that everything wrong with Matt's life. His anger, the death of his girlfriend Karen at the hand of Bullseye, all stem from his life as Daredevil. Matt ignores him and dons his costume and ends up fighting one of his old foes, Mr. Hyde, who attacks Matt Murdock's house in fustration over the breaking news.

Matt disappears for a couple of months. This press conference is his first public address since the news broke.

Mr. Silke's attempt to take over the Kingpin's territory backfires when Vanessa, the Kingpin's estranged wife, exacts revenge on all his fellow conspirators, brutally killing everyone including her own son.

Afraid for his life, Silke turns himself into the FBI. When they refuse his request for protection he gives them the one piece of information that the Kingpin had that he thinks will save him.

That Daredevil is really a blind lawyer named Matt Murdock.

The FBI decide not to follow up on the Daredevil information. But the next day, on the cover of the biggest tabloid in the city, the headline reads: Daredevil's Secret Identity Revealed.

The secret is out.

After months of a media circus with old villains trying to attack him in his civilian identity, Matt Murdock holds a nationwide press conference to announce that he is not Daredevil and he is suing the tabloid for four hundred million dollars.

Matt has decided to lie to save his law practice and himself from going to jail.

Vanessa Fisk meets Matt and announces that she has dismantled the Kingpin's entire crime syndicate operation. As a going away present, she gives Matt the name of the FBI agent that sold his story to the tabloids.

Matt's ex crime fighting partner, the Black Widow, is disturbed to see that Matt has put his secred identity away to focus on the legal fight in front of him. She makes a phone call to a voice from Daredevil's past in an attempt to shake Matt out of the mental rut she thinks he is in. Elektra has come to visit.

Connor Hawke is in an operating theater after being shot in the head by Onomatopoeia, a serial killer targeting non-powered costume adventurers. In the previous issue, surgery was abruptly interrupted by the killer, but fortunately, Green Arrow, Black Canary, and Mia Dearden were on hand to intervene.

This issue opens with a Mexican stand-off, which leads to Green Arrow placing a nocked arrow in Onomatopoeia's mouth and promising that if Connor dies, so does he. 30 minutes later, one of the doctors who survived the serial killer's initial assault announces Connor will make it. Onomatopoeia then attempts to escape. Ollie evacuates Canary, Mia, and the doctors, and hero and villain engage in a firefight which leads to the roof of the hospital. Already injured from the battle, Onomatopoeia ambushes Green Arrow, who appears to go over the edge of the rooftop. However, Ollie appears and stabs an arrow through Onomatopoeia's foot, sticking him fast to the ledge. After a moment of fighting Onomatopoeia begins to fall off the ledge, being held on by only the arrow through the his foot. He purposely pulls the arrow from his own foot, falling. When Ollie gets to the ground, the killer has escaped. An off-panel search of the area reveals that Onomatopoeia has killed a bystander in a parking garage and stolen his or her car. The issue ends with Ollie and his allies in Connor's hospital room, where he has regained consciousness.
name: The Sound of Violence, Part Three: Modulation

description: In this issue, the mysterious Mr. Locke takes the beautiful assassin on a guided tour of her blood-drenched past -- and the results will change Elektra forever!
name: Introspect Part 2

description:
Elektra is struggling to survive in the scorching heat of the Mojave Desert. With an endless loop of memories staining her every thought, will Elektra overcome? Jeremy Locke may have kept her alive, but he must pay- at the end of a blood-drenched sai!

Elektra wanders in the Mojave desert between her sin dreams and death.

J.Locke meets and discuss with his 'colleagues' about the decision to let Elektra to live, against the wishes of the others.

The hunt begins, and our greek assassin is found almost lifeless.
name: Introspect Part 3

description: She's hit rock bottom- but now Elektra’s fighting back! Will Marvel’s deadliest assassin have the final hit on Jeremy Locke and company?
name: Introspect Part 4

description: A drugged and helpless Bruce Banner has beenabducted by the mysterious Agent Pratt -- but to what end? As Sally Riker rushes to the rescue, Pratt offers Banner major clues as to who is after him -- and what they want from him. Can Sally save Banner from Pratt? Or must Banner dig down deep inside himself and tap and old friend for help?
name: The Beast Within

description:
Elektra, visiting the grave of her father, is met by a weird ninja who she kills, but before he gives Elektra an invitation to a jazz bar.

There, she gets an assignment of killing an unknown person, after hearing a story about a musician who was buried in the same cemetary of Elektra's poppa.
name: Glimpse and Echo Part 1

description:
After completing her killing assignment, Elektra has a mystic encounter with the spirit of the dead musician who ask her to kill his living son, the basket player Lyle Crawford, who's involved in the Hand affairs.

After discovering who's handling the reins of the affairs running around her, Elektra starts to hunt down all the figures that involved her in this story...

Along the road of her killings, Elektra experiences several mystic manifestations, where she's attacked or defended from the Hand's minions.

At the end she manage to identify and attack Lyle Crawford and Takashi, who engages Elektra in battle and helping the frontman of the Hand to escape safely.

Elektra awaits for Takashi and Lyle Crawford at the place of their meeting, where Lyle would take control of the ninja's school.

Battle raises, but Elektra cannot avoid to the spirits of the dead ninjas to take over control of the body of the dying Lyle. So, the Beast of the Hand arises.

Guest-starring the Captain Marvels, the Atom and Wonder Woman. It is perhaps the darkest hour of the War as heroes have fallen and allies have turned against one another. And there is more death to come. Is it any wonder that Superman has fallen into despair? Unable to tell friend from foe, he's about to shed all his humanity to end the war once and for all!
name: Total Abandon

description: Guest-starring Hal Jordan, the Spectre! Superman is brought in by the Linear Men for the war crimes they perceive the Man of Steel to have committed. Can the Spectre defend him against the tribunal that is the Quintessence? What will be the punishment and who is the surprise witness?
name: War Crimes & Punishment

description:
Just when he was beginning to think everything was okay, Superman uncovers an all-new threat from LexCorp. But whose side is company CEO Talia Head on?

  1. What Lies Beneath.
name: Disconnected!

description: A DC FULL COVERAGE! entry-point issue! The deck is loaded against Superman as he faces a more powerful than ever version of the Royal Flush Gang ? and they've converted all the local Metropolis gangs to their suits. What tricks can the Man of Steel do to win this one?
name: Diamonds and Steel

description:
1. Superman V. Steel 

The story opens up with Superman and Steel testing the Entropy Aegis suit. Superman vetoes it, saying that the power is too much. Superman later flies off and finds Lois, who is traveling with her mother. He whisks her off into the night, thinking they had not been seen, but Ella Lane saw them flying off, and later confronts Lois about it.

Meanwhile, Metropolis is attacked by a creature called Earthquake, who wants the Entropy Aegis suit for himself. When Steel finds that he is no match for Earthquake, he sneaks back to his workshop and puts on the suit. However, it overpowers him. Can he make it out alive?
name: A Call to Arms!

description:
1. Everyone Wants the Aegis : Gangs of Metropolis Part 1

The various factions in Metropolis unite as the B13 technology runs amok. Superman and Steel are caught in the middle of Metallo, LexCorp, Talia, the Cyber-Moths, and the environmental group Caeloss ? as a turf war erupts in the bowels of the City of Tomorrow.
name: Gangs of Metropolis Part One: Grip of Terror!

description: "Gangs of Metropolis" Part 2 of 3. LexCorp CEO Talia employs Metallo as she tries to wrest control of the B13 tech from Metropolis' various factions. But the Overmind is slowly turning Steel's niece into an even bigger threat, as the birth of a new Brainiac continues.
name: Gangs of Metropolis Part Two: Face of Death!

description:
1. The Big Compromise : Gangs of Metropolis Part 3

The conclusion to "Gangs of Metropolis!" The Overmind is revealed as Superman makes a sacrifice. Meanwhile, John Henry deals with Natasha's shocking transformation, and the final fate of the B13 technology is revealed!
name: Gangs of Metropolis Finale: Tech Noir

description: "The Pantheon," Part 1 of 2. A forgotten pantheon of gods come to offer the Man of Steel godhood to bolster its ranks. Will Superman fall to the temptation in order to save his loved ones?
name: Pantheon Part One: Call of the Gods!

description:
1. Pantheon Part 2: Scenes From a Marriage Between Heaven and Earth

Charged with the power of a goddess, Lois Lane confronts Wonder Woman. Is this just a normal catfight, or is Lois looking for some release from her father's death? Meanwhile, Superman battles the group of minor gods, who have empowered his wife! It's Ragnarok in Metropolis!
name: Lois Lane: Goddess of Retribution! : Pantheon Part Two : Guest Starring Wonder Woman

description:
1. Return to Krypton II Part 3: Blood and Heresy

Superman and Jor-El battle their way into the Temple of Rao, where, at its heart, the planet's true nature is revealed. But death may come to someone close to them.

Story continued from: Adventures of Superman #606

Story continues in : Action Comics #793
name: Return to Krypton II, Part 3 of 4: Blood and Heresy

description: Superman must undertake his first mission for President Luthor when the country of Bialya takes an American hostage. But can the Man of Steel risk becoming Luthor's lackey, even if it means saving a life?
name: Presidential Orders

description: "Infestation," Part 2 of 4. Superman returns home after he apparently destroys Viroxx, but the virus strikes back at the thing he holds closest to his heart: Lois. Superman watches in horror as his wife is transformed into a mindless anti-body and is sent to claim more worlds for Viroxx.
name: Infestation, Part 2 of 4

description:
Overview

New regular penciller Mike Wieringo joins the book. Jimmy Olsen and his pals are out to play the ultimate video game, but Metropolis's advanced technology soon transports Superman's pal into a deadly virtual world, one that Strange Visitor may be helping to empower. In this game, you don't get extra lives.
name: A Stranger Among Us

description: " Part 3. The Elite's Manchester Black (from ACTION COMICS #775) returns leading a new Suicide Squad to face off against the Man of Steel. Why is this extremely dangerous criminal now working for the government, and what is the Squad's true suicide mission?
name: Suicide Mission

first_appearance_locations.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

location_credits.name: Stryker's Island Maximum Security Internment Center

description: Our worlds at War tie in.
name: The Doomsday Protocol

description: "OUR WORLDS AT WAR," Part 27. The War worsens as Superman is M.I.A. and Darkseid decides to attack Earth, which had been his ally! Will our planet fall to the fury of the Parademons? Unless Luthor makes an unholy alliance with an unholy dictator, Earth might not stand a chance of surviving this latest attack.
name: Escalation

description:
"2001 43"--Superman "S" in upper right hand corner

This...doesn't look like a job for Superman. Has the Man of Steel turned his back on the world after the War? It certainly looks like it when neither the JLA nor the President can get the Man of Steel to help with the recovery of our planet. Note: Released for sale on September 12th, this comic features images that are strikingly similar to the 9/11 tragedy in New York City.

President Luthor is taking the country by storm! Superman thought he was a handful before, but with a "Jokerized" Lex Luthor, sided by Hope and Mercy, Superman's really gonna find out how dangerous the man can be.
name: Rubber Crutch

description: Legions of angry workers strike back at Perry White for his exposé in the Daily Planet, leading to the creation of a greater threat who will surely have an axe to grind with Superman!
name: A Call for Help

description: A DC FULL COVERAGE! entry-point issue! A Russian submarine's sunk in the ocean! Will Superman get to it before the seamen inside die? The answer may surprise you, as one sailor may have to make the ultimate sacrifice.
name: Borba Za Zhivuchest

description: It's a special 64-page 600th issue bonanza! When a mysterious criminal mastermind appears in Metropolis, Superman is forced to explore the deeper meanings of his relationship with his arch-nemesis, Lex Luthor. Plus, Superman's origin is retold in full-page pin-ups by some of comics' greatest talents. And, an updated take on the Superman daily comic strips, featuring the regular Superman writers and some surprising artists!
name: Now, More Than Ever--For Truth, Justice & The American Way!

description: "Cult of Persuasion" Part 1 of 2. You met disgruntled factory worker Cole Parker in issue #598 ? he had the will to defeat Superman, but not the power. Someone's changed all that, and now the Man of Steel has a deadly new enemy who's come to cut him down to size...literally!
name: The Power of Persuasion!

description: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's...Superbaby?!? Who is this strange visitor with powers and abilities far beyond those of normal infants? We're not telling just yet...but you'll be shocked to learn who his daddy is!
name: Mirror, Mirror. Part One: Super-Baby

description: Superman and Ultra-Man of the Crime Syndicate throw down in the Fortress of Solitude! And the insanity just keeps coming, as two unwanted guests show up to cause more trouble and take the mysterious Superbaby.
name: Mirror, Mirror. Part Two: Ultraman vs Superman

description: The conclusion of the Super-Baby saga! Will Superman be forced to kill Ultraman as the Fortress of Solitude grows to tremendous proportions, threatening to overtake the entire planet? And what plans do Owlman and Superwoman have?
name: Mirror, Mirror. Part Three: Custody Battle with SuperWoman and Owlman

description: "Return to Krypton II" Part 2! Jor-El and Superman confront the Rao zealots, led by the evil Xon-Ur ? who has harnesed the power of Krypton's red sun. The duo must also rescue Kal's mom Lara from their clutches.
name: Culture Shock

description: Guest-written by Jay Faerber (Noble Causes) and guest-starring Titans member Argent! Superman fights the never-ending battle against prejudice, joined by Argent. They both discover that hate has no color barrier.
name: Inner Demon!

description: "Slings and Arrows" Part 2 of 2, guest-starring Green Arrow. Hawkman and Green Arrow continue to "reevaluate" their relationship and put a stop to the string of murders plaguing St. Roch's successful businessmen. Plus, Carter Hall makes a startling decision.
name: Slings & Arrows (Part 2)

description: "Crossfire," Part 4 of 5. How can the Flash free himself from the influence of the Thinker? How can he battle a villain whose very thoughts transform the world to his own terms? And is Cyborg sorry he ever came to Keystone, now that he's met the Flash's Rogues Gallery?
name: Crossfire Part 4: Run-Down

description: The astonishing extra-sized conclusion to "Crossfire!" The saga of the Rogues and the Thinker running riot through Keystone and Central City culminates with this issue, and the Flash has been pushed to his limits. Just how is this all going to end? Featuring Chyre, Morillo, Goldface, Piper, and guest-star Cyborg!
name: Crossfire part 5 of 5

description:
Apparition is en route to Earth to reunite with long-lost husband Ultra Boy and introduce him to the baby son he's never met. Unfortunately, the spacecraft she's traveling in has gone on the fritz, she uncovers a mystery that means imminent trouble for the Legion and Earth, amd travel companion-turned- babysitter Timber Wolf finds bringing up this baby is more than he bargained for!

Apparition and Timber Wolf, with Apparition's baby in toll, make their way to Legion headquarters. Along the way, they find out that Computo is the source of the Robotica invasion.
name: 72 Hours And Counting

description:
A Harvey Award nominee for "Best New Series" and Wizard: The Comics Magazine's "Book of the Month" for April! Over a three-day period, a rescue attempt is made, the United Planets swears in a new president, the Legion elects a new team leader, and Robotica heads for Earth! Could these be the final days of the 31st Century as we'll know it?

The Legion deals with the incoming invasion of Robotica.
name: Thresholds

description: Catwoman and Slam Bradley turn the tables on the East End's crooked cops. Meanwhile, the aforementioned cops are closing in on Holly, even rousting her closest friends. We wouldn't want to be in their path!
name: Disguises, Part Three

description: The concluding chapter to "Disguises" finds Catwoman up against crooked cops, a crooked system, and one good cop after her as well. While Detective Allen tries to take Catwoman down, Holly finds herself the object of a massive manhunt. And, at the end of the day, our hero can only stop the symptom, not the disease that's rotting out the ranks of the Gotham police. At last, the player behind it all is revealed!
name: Disguises, Part Four

description:
Despite becoming enemies, when an attack hospitalizes Slade's ex-wife, the man known as the Terminator decides to take action.

A man in a helicopter attacks a shipment being protected by Adeline Kane is attacked and stolen, leaving Addie severely injured.

Slade kills a bull elephant for a village in Kenya, and while planning on leaving his home to see Addie, his house is attacked and destroyed but a man in a helicopter; it was an attack carried out by the Ravager for the government of Qurac.
name: Full Cycle, Chapter One: Assault!

description:
They hospitalized his ex-wife. They tried to kill him and destroy everything he had. Now it's time for the man known as the Terminator to strike back against the new Ravager.

On his hunt for Addie's attacker, Slade helps save a young boy. Meanwhile, the CIA sends out a warrant for Slade.
name: Full Cycle, Chapter Two: Kidnapped

description:
The Terminator comes face-to-face with the even deadlier new Ravager in an all-out brawl between two super-powered soldiers.

Deathstroke goes to confront the man who is calling himself by the name of Ravager, a name used by Deathstroke's late son Grant. They battle and Ravager quickly gains the upper hand, and just as Deathstroke regains the upper hand to kill Ravager Kaddam appears and shoots him, and Wintergreen is unable to help him. Ravager leaves them to be apprehended by the US government.
name: Full Cycle, Chapter Three: ...Of Course You Realize, This Means War!

description:
The Terminator faces off with Ravager in a duel to the death, and if Deathstroke fails, Washington, D.C. is doomed!

Slade is arrested by the CIA, but he escapes and goes to fight the Ravager, who is planning on blowing up Washington, D.C.
name: Full Cycle, Chapter Four: ...Bombs Bursting in Air!

description:
Slade returns for his former friend Wintergreen, but an army of CIA operatives, who are ready for him, guards the hospital.

Deathstroke visits the hospital to speak to Wintergreen and Addie. He enters in disguise, knowing that everyone will be watching out for him.

While he is talking to Wintergreen, assassins come and try to kill him. Pretty soon, a fair portion of the building is on fire and Slade needs to get out fast. He goes to save Addie, but she'd prefer to stay and burn then go with him. He gets Wintergreen, and gets out.
name: Revelations and Resolutions

description: Someone is assassinating mob bosses in Gotham City, and Deathstroke intends to find out who it is. The only problem is that Batman doesn't take kindly to a wanted murderer running around his city.
name: City of Assassins Episode One: The Offer

description:
There are three killers on the loose in the streets of Gotham and the Terminator is one of them. It's time for Commissioner Gordon to call in some help. It's the throw-down of the century as Deathstroke the Terminator goes toe-to-toe with the Batman!

Deathstroke is looking for the mole in the police department, and Batman offers his help, but Slade is against working with partners after so many of their deaths.
name: City of Assassins Episode Two: The Rival

description: The man known as the Terminator continues his quest to find the inside man in the police department from the crime bosses of Gotham City. Working against each other didn't work. Perhaps Deathstroke and Batman will have more success as partners.
name: City of Assassins Episode Three: The Allies

description: When Slade is at the mercy of his enemies and is forced to into a confrontation with the mob families of Gotham. Things get even more complicated when Batman and the masked killer, the Vigilante, make the scene.
name: City of Assassins Episode Four: The Resurrection

description:
Learn the origin of this gun totting enforcer of justice. And what will she mean to the life of Deathstroke?

Deathstroke's injuries aren't healing as fast as they should. Meanwhile, Vigilante is worried about her former partner's son, who has gotten caught up in drug activity.
name: The Loneliest Number, Part 1: Needs and Necessities

description: The Loneliest Number: Part 2 of 2. "Crimes and Commitments!" Guest-starring the new Vigilante. Cameos by Batman, Superman, and the Teen Titans. Slade and the new Vigilante form a partnership, and their enemies are going to pay. But do they cross a line when they also form a romantic relationship?
name: The Loneliest Number, Part 2: Crimes and Commitments

description:
The Man of Steel has apprehended Deathstroke. Now Slade has a moment to reflect on his past and how he ended up where he is.

Story continued from Superman (1987-2006) #68.
name: Sympathy for the Devil

description: "Terminator Hunt: The Powers that Be!" Guest-starring Superman and the Justice League of America. Team Titans cameo (1st appearance). Superman has turned Slade over to the authorities, but Deathstroke is not known as one of the most dangerous men in the DCU for nothing. When the Terminator makes a daring escape attempt he comes face-to-face with the Justice League of America. Can Deathstroke escape and clear his name?
name: The Powers That Be

description:
Deathstroke the Terminator is wanted by the law and is on the run from not only police but also the Titans!

Total Chaos part 1 of 9. Deathstroke, growing weaker and weaker, is being hunted by the C.I.A. and by the New Titans. Nightwing has split up the Titans and sent them undercover throughout New York City, coordinating everything with Wintergreen. The undercover Nightwing and Starfire are robbed by a pick-pocket gang of small kids, which calls their notice to Deathstroke. Deathstroke is also targeted by the same gang of kids, and when Deathstroke realizes it, the fight draws Nightwing and Starfire’s attention. The kids steal Deathstroke’s equipment, and the mercenary hunts them down for it, managing to escape from the two Titans. He finds the kids, who are under the thumb of a local crime boss. Deathstoke takes out the crime boss, but his sickness catches up to him. Deathstroke passes out in the sewers on the way to S.T.A.R. Labs.

Meanwhile, the Team Titans have come back in time to kill Donna Troy before her son can become the world dictator Lord Chaos. Redwing has been captured by the Titans, but Mirage is still disguised as Starfire. Donna goes into labor, and she and Terry Long go to the S.T.A.R. Labs hospital. The real Starfire has escaped her prison, while the fake Starfire (Mirage) arrives at S.T.A.R. Labs to kill Donna Troy.
name: Child's Play

description:
Slade is dying, and the means of saving his life may lie in the Terminator's past. Plus, who is Sweet Lili, not to mention her white-haired daughter?

Total Chaos part 4 of 9. While Deathstroke, the New Titans, and the Team Titans figure out their next step in finding the kidnapped Donna Troy, Deathstroke passes out. The sickness he has been infected with is eating away his reserve. Wintergreen and Changeling bring Deathstroke to bed and watch over him. While Changeling is distracted, Deathstroke decides to leave to deal with the sickness on his own. He and Wintergreen blast out of the Titans’ temporary base, and escape.

To keep his mind on something other than his ailment, Wintergreen prompts Deathstroke to tell him a story of old friends. Deathstroke talks about his time in Cambodia, when he and other American troops liberate a brothel run by Sweet Lili. Sweet Lili convinces Deathstroke and his allies to help her free her friends held captive by the Khmer Rouge. During the firefight, Deathstroke is wounded, and Lili rescues him and the two fell in love, eventually fleeing to Thailand.

In the present, Wintergreen brings a feverish Deathstroke to Sweet Lili, who has also provided protection to the pick-pocket gang from last issue. There, Deathstroke meets Lili’s daughter Rose, who is old enough to be Deathstroke’s daughter as well. Sweet Lili promises to help Deathstroke escape New York City, but instead he finds himself captured.
name: Escape From New York!

description:
This issue features the death of Slade Wilson! What does this mean for the future of Deathstroke the Terminator?

Total Chaos part 7 of 9. While it looks like Deathstroke has been finally captured, looks can be deceiving. Deathstroke has sent a decoy to be captured, while he flees the NYPD in Sweet Lili’s helicopter. Deathstroke tries avoiding an NYPD helicopter, but is shot down near Titans Island. While Deathstroke is avoiding capture again, the NYPD has been tailing Wintergreen. Wintergreen escapes his tail at JFK Airport.

Deathstroke washes up on Titans Island, which he finds has been taken over by Lord Chaos and his men. Angered, Deathstroke takes on Lord Chaos’ security forces, slaughtering them wholesale. However, at the end of the gunfight, Deathstroke finally succumbs to his infection. He has a heart attack on the island. While he drops, he is being watched by Mammoth of the new Brotherhood of Evil.
name: Terminated: The Death of Slade Wilson

description:
Slade Wilson is dead. However, the super-villain organization known as the Brotherhood of Evil has other plans for the man known as Deathstroke the Terminator.

Shimmer and Mammoth steal Deathstroke's "dead" body. Meanwhile Wintergreen has been arrested, and is in prison.
name: The Nuclear Winter, Part 1: Genesis: DNA

description: The Nuclear Winter: Part 2 of 4. "A Question of Brotherhood!" The Brotherhood of Evil is back and more dangerous than ever. For they now count the Terminator as one of their members.
name: The Nuclear Winter, Part 2: A Question of Brotherhood!

description: The Nuclear Winter: Part 3 of 4. "Invasion!" Guest-starring Checkmate. In order to steal nuclear warheads for Cheshire's evil machinations, Deathstroke leads the Brotherhood of Evil into Russia. However, if he succeeds, it could mean the death of millions!
name: The Nuclear Winter, Part 3: Invasion!

description: The Nuclear Winter: Part 4 of 4. "Heatwave!" Guest-starring Checkmate. Cheshire and the Brotherhood of Evil have just destroyed an entire nation with nuclear fire, and it's all Deathstroke's fault. Now, as the government special forces known as Checkmate stage a full-scale assault on the Brotherhood, Cheshire must face the wrath of the man called Terminator!
name: The Nuclear Winter, Part 4: Heatwave

description: "Love and Death!" Guest-starring Vigilante. When the Vigilante comes in search of the murderer named Bloody Mary she soon learns her mark is under the protection of Deathstroke the Terminator. It's student vs. teacher in a bloody battle to decide the fate of one woman's soul!
name: Love and Death!

description: The Quality of Mercy: Part 1 of 2. "Fire and Blood!" A mercenary group known as Fire and Blood have kidnaped an ambassador's son. Deathstroke is hired to get him back, but Slade soon finds out that there's more to this caper than meets the eye.
name: The Quality of Mercy, Part 1: Fire and Blood

description: The Quality of Mercy: Part 2 of 2. "Fire and Blood!" Has Deathstroke finally met his match? Slade goes head-to-head with the man called the Janissary!
name: The Quality of Mercy, Part 2: The Cold Game

description: "Into the Black Dome!" Part 1 of 2. Slade is hired to find a murderer. The only problem is his mark is locked away inside a hermetically sealed bio-dome. Deathstroke will soon learn that breaking in is only half the problem. It's getting out that may kill him.
name: Into the Black Dome

description: "Escape from the Black Dome!" Part 2 of 2. To find and catch a murderer, Deathstroke broken into the Black Dome. That was the easy part. The hard part is getting out of this hermetically sealed environment alive.
name: Escape from the Black Dome

description: "Gauntlet!" Needing a respite from the recent events in his life, Slade returns to Kenya. But the Terminator soon learns that another kind of danger is waiting for him here. Plus, don't miss the return of Wintergreen!
name: Gauntlet

description: World Tour '93: Part 1 of 8. "England!" Slade embarks on his biggest adventure yet. A search for his missing ex-wife will take the Terminator on a world tour where death, romance, and lost treasure await him. First stop...England.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 1: England

description: World Tour '93: Part 2 of 8. "Versailles!" Deathstroke's world tour continues as he, Wintergreen, and Waller head to Germany. As they close in on Addie and her abductor they soon learn that the secrets behind an ancient suit of armor may have lasting effects on the rest of their lives.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 2: Versailles

description: World Tour '93: Part 3 of 8. "Hong Kong!" Vigilante cameo. Deathstroke and Wintergreen arrive in Hong Kong only to come face-to-face with an army of gun-totting goons and a mysterious woman who may hold the key to them finding Addie. Plus, a shocking last page that sets the stage for next issue's inevitable showdown.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 3: Hong Kong

description: World Tour '93: Part 4 of 8. "China!" Guest-starring Vigilante. Slade and his associates continue their search for Addie in China and come face-to-face with Deathstroke's erstwhile rival and lover - Vigilante!
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 4: China

description: World Tour '93: Part 5 of 8. "India!" When Deathstroke and company arrive in India the mystery behind Slade's ex-wife's kidnaping comes to a head as Deathstroke comes face-to-face with his deadliest adversary yet.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 5: India

description: World Tour '93: Part 6 of 8. "Paris!" Deathstroke's world tour kicks into high gear as he finally come face-to-face with Addie's kidnaper.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 6: Paris

description: World Tour '93: Part 7 of 8. "Dallas!" Guest-starring Vigilante. Slade and Wintergreen head back stateside and fall into a well laid trap. Maybe with a little help from his former student and lover, Vigilante, Slade and his friend can survive long enough to finish their quest for answers.
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 7: Dallas

description: World Tour '93: Part 8 of 8. "Egypt!" Guest-starring Vigilante. All bets are off as Deathstroke's world tour comes to its mind-shattering conclusion. In the desert sands of Egypt, Slade faces off with his enemy for the life of his ex-wife and the treasure that could alter human history
name: Deathstroke's World Tour, Chapter 8: Egypt

description: "To Thine Own Self...!" In the aftermath of the Terminator's world tour, Slade Wilson finds himself following a self-destructive path, and even Wintergreen may not be able to help him. Plus, a young mercenary is out to make a name for himself by taking out the man called Deathstroke.
name: To Thine Own Self...

description: "Sins of the Father!" Alongside Aniel, an Israeli secret service agent, Deathstroke storms Muller's stronghold, and after fighting their way throw an army of goons they come face-to-face with the man called Catalyst. Can even the Terminator defeat an adversary that can increase his speed and strength exponentially just by thinking about it?
name: Sins of The Father!

description: "Land of Milk and Blood!" Vigilante cameo. Deathstroke and Aniel must get to the leader of the Mossad, the Israel Secret Service, to warn him about a murdering operative. First they'll have to fight their way through an army of trained assassins to do it. Plus, someone close to Slade is hiding a terrible secret.
name: Land of Milk and Blood

description: Batman returns to try and reconcile with Robin, but their tender professional moment is broken as a new villain hits the scene with a bang, hijacking the Batmobile! It’s blowout action, new gadgets, and a surprise development or two as Robin enters the most turbulent phase yet of his career!
name: Joyride

description: The giant, creepy creature known as Charaxis hits town...or does he? Before he was transformed into Charaxis, he was Killer Moth. Now, his legacy is running about town, and mystery abounds as a series of crimes is committed simultaneously...by the same man! Meanwhile, Spoiler receives a piece of news that will change her life forever, and an old pal of Tim Drake's returns.
name: Scattered Fruit: Part 1 A Bug's Life
